org.openadaptor.thirdparty.velocity
Class VelocityProcessor

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.Component
      org.openadaptor.thirdparty.velocity.VelocityProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Administrable, IComponent, IDataProcessor
public class VelocityProcessor
extends Component
implements IDataProcessor

Simple Processor that uses a Velocity Template to format data.

Method Detail

process

public java.lang.Object[] process(java.lang.Object data)
Description copied from interface: IDataProcessor
Processes some data and return the results. Results must be in an array. Valid return values include null and empty arrays which indicate that the data is to be discarded. It is assumed that implementations will cast the incoming data to an expected type(s). Exceptions should be thrown as RuntimeException. If the implementation is an IComponent then this should be a subclass of OAException. Generally this will be a ProcessingException as the most likey problems are going to be with processing message data.

Specified by:
process in interface IDataProcessor
Returns:
output, zero length array or null indicates that data was discarded

reset

public void reset(java.lang.Object context)
Description copied from interface: IDataProcessor
Allows calling code to communicate context information, the implementation will cast the context to an expected type.

Specified by:
reset in interface IDataProcessor
Parameters:
context -
See Also:
IReadConnector.getReaderContext()

validate

public void validate(java.util.List exceptions)
Description copied from interface: IDataProcessor
This method checks that the current state of an implementation is "meaningful". Implementations of IDataProcessor are typically beans with zero-arg constructors. Implementations are encouraged to add exception to the list parameter rather than throwing them. This allows the calling code to collate the exceptions. If the implementation is an IComponent then the exceptions should be a ValidationException.

Specified by:
validate in interface IDataProcessor
Parameters:
exceptions - collection to which exceptions should be added. Must not be null
